web.title: Math 4 Dumb
web.projectDesc: This web aims to help students from elementary school to high school in learning math easily and fun. Because, on this web the material will be presented interactively and students can create discussion threads when facing difficult material so that it can be answered by other users. This web is built with Vue.js and Tailwind for the front-end. Then, using Express.js as a backend endpoint and MySql for database storage where storage includes account storage, material bookmarks, and discussion posts. And account security has also used Bcrypt, JWT, and Cookies.

web.title: Digital Signage Video Uploader
web.projectDesc: This website functions to manage video that will be displayed on digital signage (Raspberry Pi 3), where through this web we can upload videos, schedule when videos will be displayed, and cancel videos to be displayed. The data of video files, and video schedule information will be stored in Firebase.
